long.ar,ca,cs,da,de,el,es,fi,hu,it,ja,ko,nl,n:
Share any content from Chrome device to ViewBoard® Interactive Flat Panels

ViewBoard® Cast software is designed for wireless presentations and wireless collaboration – say goodbye to wires for good! 

Working with ViewBoard® Cast software, the vCastSender app, will allow your Chrome device to not only stream live recordings but also share your screen, photos, and videos directly onto ViewSonic® ViewBoard® Interactive Flat Panels and other mobile devices. Let the collaborations begin! Whether, in class or in a meeting, vCastSender app makes teaching and group discussion quick and easy.


The release note as below.
1. Fixed memorized PIN code connecting to ViewBoard® Cast issue.
2. Minor improvement and fixes.
